articles.title: If you talked to debt collector, a recording may be online – with details on what you owe - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Debt-IN says its records on 1.4 million South Africans have been found on the dark web, after a breach in April.
articles.content:
• The personal data of 1.4 million South Africans – including details of outstanding debt – has leaked online. 
  • The cache also contains recordings of calls from debt collectors.
